section.heading: Voluntary Transfer of Leave Program Report.
section.text: On or before February 1 of each year, the Office of Personnel shall provide a Voluntary Transfer of Leave Program Report to the Council. The report shall include:

para.text: A comprehensive list of all voluntary leave bank contributors;
A comprehensive list of all transfer of leave recipients;
Documentation demonstrating that proper deductions have been taken from the contributor’s leave accrual;
Documentation demonstrating the actual transfer of leave to the recipient; and

If the head of an agency excludes an employee or group of employees from the program under § 1-612.32(d) because an organization or program within the agency would be substantially disrupted in carrying out its functions or would incur additional costs:
The manner in which the organization or program within the agency would be substantially disrupted in carrying out its functions; or
The amount of additional costs which will be incurred and the reasons that they will be incurred.
